dataset_id: BOREAS Follow-On FLX-01 NSA-OBS Derived Data - NEE, GEE, and Respiration
title: BOREAS Follow-On FLX-01 NSA-OBS Derived Data - NEE, GEE, and Respiration
summary: The BOREAS Follow-On FLX-01 team derived NEE, GEE, and Respiration using measured tower C02 flux measurements taken at the NSA-OBS site.  The data provided contain half-hourly measurements as well as 4 and 5 day binned data sets.  The derived data covers the period from March 1994 through the end of 1998.

citation: Zhou, X., C. Peng, Q.L. Dang, J. Sun, H. Wu, and D. Hua. 2008. Simulating carbon exchange in Canadian Boreal forests. Ecological Modelling. 219(3-4):287-299.
